edu.upenn.cis.pdtb.graphics
Class PTBPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  edu.upenn.cis.pdtb.graphics.PTBPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, PDTBNodeSelectionListener, javax.swing.Scrollable, java.io.Serializable
public class PTBPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements PDTBNodeSelectionListener, javax.swing.Scrollable

Contains the parse trees for a PTB file. Each parse tree is a VTreeCanvas. The panel also listens for PDTBNode selection events to implement to scroll the appropriate area into visiblity.

Author:
nikhild
See Also:
VTreeCanvas, Serialized Form
